ethics_section: This research study was conducted in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki, and the protocol was approved by the Ethics Committee of XYZ University (protocol number 123456). Informed consent was obtained from all subjects involved in the study. Privacy and confidentiality of personal data were ensured. Any potential harm that could be inflicted on the participants during the research was mitigated, and they were given the right to withdraw from the study at any time without facing any kind of prejudice.
